dist.hmm

Class ForwardBackwardProbabilityCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.hmm.ForwardBackwardProbabilityCalculator

  • public class ForwardBackwardProbabilityCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of the forward backward algorithm, which computes forward and backward probabilities for use in the Viterbi and Baum-Welch algorithms
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
